{{cpp/experimental/ranges/title|Permutable}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/iterator/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=ranges|1=
template&lt; class I &gt;
concept bool Permutable =
    ForwardIterator&lt;I&gt; &amp;&amp;
    IndirectlyMovableStorable&lt;I, I&gt; &amp;&amp;
    IndirectlySwappable&lt;I, I&gt;;
}}

{{tt|Permutable}} 概念指定通过移动或交换元素，原位重排它们的算法（例如 {{ltt|cpp/experimental/ranges/algorithm/rotate|ranges::rotate}}）的常用要求。
